title: Disconnected In A rank game. Re-open lol keeps updating
body:
Anyone disconnect from rank game now?
When I reopened LOL, It keeps updating.

What should I do now. The game is still going on.

replies.body: There was a patch last night, so it's possible that some server issues may have raised during that time.  Hopefully everything should be okay now!  Let me know if you still have any issues.

Same happened with me, but in a normal draft game :/ 
MY game going on too right now, but can't join in coz of update :/
